publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.div_rhyme: aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa
div.head: Az európai hadakozásokra
div.p: Neque hic lupis mos, nec fuit leonibus Unquam, nisi in dispar, feris. Furorne coecus, an rapit vis acrior? An culpa?... HORATIUS
